English: We are drinking a cup of coffee.
I buy a carton of milk.
I was reading (some of) a/the book.
We watched the movie (until the end)
I will read the book (finishing the whole book)
We will watch the movie (watching the whole movie)
I am building / will build a house (completely)
You invite me to your party.
I invite you to my party.
The boss is laying us off.
You've been chosen to work for us!
He saw them at the zoo.
I won't eat an apple today.

hungarian: Saara nem nyitotta ki az ablakot.

English: I have to buy a car.
We have to open the door.
You have to sell the computer.
You have to forget about the man.
You have to forget about him.
A glass is taken in the bar.
I move (all) the computers to the storehouse.
I move (several) computers to the storehouse.
In this store they sell phones.
In this store they sell the phones (we talked about before).
hungarian: Ez az üzlet telefonokat árul. (amiről korábban beszéltünk)

English: I buy T-shirts from the store.
I buy the T-shirts from the store.
hungarian: A boltból veszek pólókat (amiről korábban beszéltünk).
